content: I am looking to experiment with using the AuditEvent log to inform a Patient on how their data was used. Is there apps that record AuditEvents when they use or create data? Are there servers that record AuditEvent logs for accesses? I am looking for a body of AuditEvent data that I can test my app against. see https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2019/06/patient-engagement-access-log.html

I think Grahames server does as well...
(neat use case BTW)
@Grahame Grieve If I remember correctly, the internet facing test servers from you do not have this audit turned on... Can I get it turned on? Or is it on?

I think it's on. It was off by accident (turned it off while debugging and forgot to turn it on). But current R4 server has 9 audit events, so it obviously isn't turned out. I'll add it to my todo list
